alert.note: Alert for Loup Rivers Basin (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 19 at 2:59PM CDT until March 19 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Red Flag Conditions Expected Into This Evening... .The combination of low relative humidity values and gusty southwesterly winds will result in critical fire weather conditions for the rest of this afternoon into the early evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 209... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 209. * WIND...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
